generated_body: The article titled "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu" is likely to explore the various factors that contribute to the enduring presence of the Filet-O-Fish sandwich in McDonald's offerings. Overall, the article may aim to provide insights into the strategic decisions behind menu selections at fast-food chains.
